description: React component for managing bookings, including listing, creating, editing, and deleting booking records. Implements CRUD UI with form handling, API interactions, and booking data visualization.

methods.name: fetchBookings
methods.description: Fetches booking data from the API and updates component state.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles submission of the booking form for creating or updating bookings.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Prepares the form for editing an existing booking.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a booking entry via API call and updates the UI.

ctags.name: handleSubmit
ctags.pattern: /^        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={{ marginBottom: 16, border: "1px solid #e9ecef", pa/

fields.name: <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={{ marginBottom: 16, border: "1px solid #e9ecef", pa/
